title: Allow setting db directory from env variable
body: This adds allowing setting an environment variable `DB_DIR` for the db storage so it doesn't have to be stored in the app directory.
author: tgm4883

title: Error "Invalid Host header" behind traefik-reverse-proxy
body: When I try to make the container accessible via traefik (https) I get the error "Invalid Host header". how can I solve this?
author: matze939939

comments.body: I passed  "- DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true" as an environment variable in the docker-compose file. That did the trick

> I passed "- DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true" as an environment variable in the docker-compose file. That did the trick
